game.name: Tales of Monkey Island: Complete Season
game.shortDescription: While explosively stripping the evil pirate LeChuck of his demonic mojo, Guybrush Threepwood inadvertently infects the entire Caribbean with the arch-fiend's expelled voodoo, which threatens to transform buccaneers into unruly pirate monsters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: While explosively stripping the evil pirate LeChuck of his demonic mojo, Guybrush Threepwood inadvertently infects the entire Caribbean with the arch-fiend's expelled voodoo, which threatens to transform buccaneers into unruly pirate monsters.

reviewHighlights.text: 힌트시스템이 있다면 좋을 듯하다. 제작자들의 유머감각이 십분 발휘되는 게임.
